headline: Xcel Energy Announces the Pricing Terms and Upsizing of its Cash Tender Offers for Outstanding First Mortgage Bonds Issued by Northern States Power Company (a Minnesota Corporation)
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 16, 2024--Xcel Energy Inc. (NASDAQ: XEL) (Xcel Energy) announced today the pricing terms of its previously announced offers to purchase for cash (the Tender Offers) in the order of priority set forth in the table below certain outstanding first mortgage bonds issued by Northern States Power Company, a Minnesota corporation (NSPM), a wholly-owned subsidiary of Xcel Energy (the Bonds), pursuant to an Offer to Purchase, dated December 2, 2024 (as amended by this press release,
